sheet.name: en
sheet.text: It means he's basically still a little kid.
That's just how he looks on the outside.
Squares has always looked like this, hasn't he? Even when he was created?
You were just acting like a spoiled brat.
No. I just wanted everything to go back to the way it was. Marle, the worlds—everything.
Back to when the two of us watched over the worlds. Back to when all was right.
You acted like an immature brat throwing a tantrum because you didn't like change.
I'm actually impressed by how far your immaturity has gotten you.
No... wait! That can't be it!
It is, Squares. That's how it happened.
I was so preoccupied by everything else.
I completely neglected the fact that you were basically an infant.
You think I'm immature? You have no idea how powerful I am, do you!?
I'm infinitely stronger than you, and I'll prove it!
Now you've seen my power for yourself!
Could you really not tell, Squares?
Why would you do that, Marle!?
Because you won't hear what I have to say otherwise.
There's nothing stopping you from erasing everyone here.
But if you do, it won't be like nothing ever happened.
In your ideal world, everything is permanent and unchanging.
But that kind of world simply doesn't exist!
You weren't exactly perfect yourself either, Marle!
You threw in the towel just like THAT! And Squares! You're just... letting him... *furious tooting*
Sometimes Ringo gets so worked up that she makes train whistle sounds.
I'll take over for Ringo since I don't make weird noises.
Marle, do you really want to leave us?
Do you really want to go back to doing that stuff Squares was talking about?
Like I said, this is all my fault.
It's impossible for the world you desire to exist.
I should've paid more attention to what you were doing instead of being afraid and dismissive.
If only I was just honest with you from the beginning...
What was the point of everything you taught me!?
There's only one way I can explain it to you.
It may not be clear at first, but it's all I can do.
For a fun and orderly battle!
I've made mistakes in the past, too.
You can open up to us. Everyone here is willing to listen.
You don't have to carry this burden alone.
You all stand in the face of destruction.
You're not afraid. You're not angry. I don't understand...
They're not afraid because that's just who they are.
I said you're obtuse! Stubborn! Hard-headed! Inflexible!
Everyone here is trying their hardest for YOU!
So why do you have to act like this!?
I admit, it was my fault all of this started in the first place.
But you're taking it WAY too far!
And besides, I know what you're up to.
You never planned to actually harm anyone here.
You were never serious about any of this!
You know what must be done.
But you refuse to accept it!
And for that... I have to teach you a lesson!
Battles will never stop being fun!
Do you get it now, Squares?
See how we followed the rules of battle and kept things in order?
That's all I ever wanted you to understand when I made you!
Still wanna get rid of us?
I hope Marle helped you to see things differently.
I'd certainly be happy if you did.
Why do you act like you still have faith in me?
I tried to destroy all of you.
I've said horrible things to you.
I know exactly how you feel.
The odd thing is, there's no real explanation.
These people have faith in you because that's just who they are.
I've caused you all so much trouble. I'm sorry.
I'm sorry for what I've done.
I know a simple apology isn't going to fix everything.
Then it's over? What a relief! Right, Carby?
Of course! Why? Were you lying or something?
Then why wouldn't we believe you if you're being honest?
These people are kind and trusting because that's just how they are.
Squares's rampage has come to an end.
The worlds are at peace once more.
You know, I didn't expect everything to end like this.
Well, you don't have to be so rude about it!
This is all so much... You've taken me in as if I never tried to destroy you.
And besides, you're the reason we all got to see each other again!
We never would've met Marle without you.
Sooo I was never really THAT mad at you!
Well, I'll be taking my leave...
Some place where I won't trouble any of you ever again.
Whaaat? But we finally became friends!
I don't recall that decision being made...
Really? Then let's make it official right now!
Let's have a battle together and seal the deal! It'll be fun!
I don't think it's that simple.
Is that what this sensation is?
You're all right, Squares. I like you.
*giggle* I'm gonna have lots of fun teasing you!
Remember how we all welcomed you with open arms?
Squares is getting the same treatment.
His original plan was to erase all of you from existence.
While I was under his control, he amassed an enormous amount of power.
He no longer has any use for it now.
But the power inside him has yet to be released...
Marle, what can we do to stop this?
There may be another way to release the power within him.
Then let's get to it already!
Yes problemo! It's a rather huge problemo, in fact!
Insurmountable power is coursing through Squares as we speak.
As a result, he's become significantly stronger.
Then we have no time to waste!
All this explode-y power stuff doesn't matter!
What matters is that our friend needs our help!
Our attempt to rescue Squares is about to commence.
This will be our final showdown!
It's all right. He's just passed out. Must've taken a lot out of him.
Allow me to express my gratitude in his place.
Well, then. I guess this is it...
The worlds are trying to go back to the way they're supposed to be.
I don't think we have much time.
The worlds are starting to split apart.
Well, because of Mr. Sleepyhead here.
He WAS the one who merged the worlds together in the first place.
Now that that's over, everything's going back to normal.
Yes, Squares may have an older-looking physical form.
But in reality, it hasn't been that long since I created him.
The worlds are reverting back to their original state...
The dimensions are beginning to split apart.
That's just the way the universe works!
The worlds were merged together by force, remember?
And it was Squares here who did it.
But now, the powers he used to merge them are gone.
Everything's going back to the way it's supposed to be.
I'm sorry, but... it can't be stopped.
I suggest you say your goodbyes.
It caused Marle a great deal of confusion.
Clearing THAT block makes everything go dark.
And clearing THAT block makes everything go fast.
You know that ruleset that turns everything into a party?
Oh, yeah, I know what you're talking about.
That one really does liven things up.
There's always so much going on.
I get confused trying to figure everything out...
That ruleset kicks my butt all the time, so now WE can kick its butt together!
So? Getting the hang of it?
If you need more practice, just say the word!
It's probably a good idea since we'll end up having to do it anyway.
Especially if we'll be going all out on our opponent.
...What the heck are you talking about?
Wait, wait, wait. Are you saying you wanna practice right now?
Now, now! ♪ Feel free to choose anyone as your ally.
Take me down, if you can!
It helped a lot. Thanks, Ecolo.
I just wish we could avoid having to fight like this for real.
Well, we still don't know what'll happen.
But you can never be too prepared!
Preparation is always a good thing!
This is somewhere only Squares and I know about.
It rests on the farthest reaches of the universe, overlooking all of spacetime.
So you're saying we're waaaaay up in the sky?
I guess you could say that.
But we're far beyond the sky...
This is where you meet your end.
Everything you've done, everything you are... It will be as if you never existed.
Why? Because your very being is a conflict to order. You are a parasite.
Me? But I thought YOU were the Dimensional Parasite, Squares...
YOU'RE the Dimensional Parasite. Every one of you is.
You called out to "see each other again," correct?
"I'm so happy to see you again."
"We can have fun together again, just like old times."
You had these thoughts, and you didn't know why.
But they were the result of worlds merging that were never meant to merge.
If I'm happy to see my friends, then of course I'm gonna wish for another chance to see them!
Is that really such a bad thing!?
It's not right. It threatens order.
...Is that really what you think is "right," Squares?
Then I'm FINE with being a Dimensional Parasite! ♪
All you talk about is what you think is "right"! Is that all that matters to you!?
Being "right" means maintaining the fun and order of the puzzle worlds.
If order is removed from the picture, there's no telling what may happen to the worlds.
Then that doesn't mean this HAS to end badly, does it?
Of course it's going to end badly.
Maybe I don't get all this dimension stuff.
But for me, I care about seeing my friends!
That's way more important than any dumb order!
I know you'll feel the same way, Squares!
If you could just be our friend...
You're wasting my time. If you're going to fight me, do it now.
I totally beat him, but he's standing there like nothing happened!
Would you look at that? It seems you've gotten a little stronger.
But you're still nothing compared to me.
I also possess the powers I received from Marle, which she drained from you.
So trust me. I can destroy each and every one of you with my eyes closed.
We'll keep coming at you no matter what!
So you're okay with us being Dimensional Parasites?
I kind of get where you're coming from.
After all, you've seen and know WAY more than we do.
You're just really dedicated to your rules.
Rules, shmules. I've got just ONE rule of thumb:
If no one's following your rule, then it was probably a dumb rule to begin with!
It's not about what you think is "right."
No, not me! What do YOU want?
And I mean the REAL Squares! Not this Squares who's all about "order" and keeping things "right."
Order... I must maintain order at all costs.
What are you trying to say?
Maybe a battle will help me get through to you!
Guess that didn't do the trick...
Do you really think attacking me over and over will—
There's something weird about all this...
Ringo, stay focused! He's coming your way!
I just have something on my mind!
First, I apologize in advance for not asking this sooner.
There's something I wanna know about Squares.
Why's he so obsessed with you? And why does he only care about what's "right"?
Y-Your guess is as good as mi—
Don't give me that! You've gotta know. You're the closest one to him!
When it comes to his beliefs, Squares seems like the, uh, close-minded type.
Which is weird, considering the whole "watching over worlds" responsibility.
I think I might have a hunch...
That's nobody's business but mine and Marle's!
But I suppose that doesn't matter now.
You're all going to be erased soon anyway!
If that's how it's gonna be, then let's battle!
Guess your power's nothing to sneeze at.
*scoff* You didn't even leave a scratch.
When the dust settles, I'll be the only one standing.
And all will be right again.
I think I know what you're trying to do.
So let me take a shot.
All right... I'm counting on you!
You two were tasked with maintaining fun and order.
I'm assuming the one who gave Squares this task was his creator.
That was you, if I'm not mistaken.
What does this have to do with anything!?
Why did you decide on "fun" and "order" as the rules to uphold?
To me, fun and order are the fundamentals of battling.
I've watched over all of you for a very long time.
I've learned that battles need rules to keep them in order.
They also need to be fun if we're going to keep having them.
These were, in my eyes, the two golden rules. ♪
And I dreamed about them constantly!
All I ever wanted was to have friends who understood the balance between fun and order.
All the pieces of the puzzle are starting to come together.
I'm only going to say this one more time.
I'm your opponent. Lower your guard again, and I'll crush you.
All right, all right. I hear you.
Then what are you waiting for!?
Forgive me. I talk too much sometimes.
Oh, there's no doubt you have tremendous power.
But do you really want to know the reason you still can't win?
It's because you have no control. You don't know how to properly handle your power.
And your heart is too fickle. You have no idea what you really believe in.
I can handle this. You can trust me.
